org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.utility.ontology

Interface OntNodeHandler


  • public interface OntNodeHandler
    Interface contains methods to handle and filter ontology nodes (based on RDF) as to their content.
    Author:
    agatting on 08.08.17.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<OntAggregatedStateChange> getAggLiteralElements(List<OntAggregatedStateChange> stateChanges, OntConfig.StateValueType dataType)
      Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes literals of the input data type.
      static List<OntAggregatedStateChange> getAggResourceElements(List<OntAggregatedStateChange> stateChanges)
      Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes resources.
      static List<OntStateChangeBuf> getLiteralElements(List<OntStateChangeBuf> stateChanges, OntConfig.StateValueType dataType)
      Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes literals of the input data type.
      static String getRDFNodeName(org.apache.jena.query.QuerySolution querySolution, String name)
      Method gets the rdfNode from the input querySolution based on input name and returns the lexical form.
      static List<OntStateChangeBuf> getResourceElements(List<OntStateChangeBuf> stateChanges)
      Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes resources.

    • Method Detail

      • getLiteralElements

        static List<OntStateChangeBuf> getLiteralElements(List<OntStateChangeBuf> stateChanges,
                                                  OntConfig.StateValueType dataType)
                                           throws org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException
        Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes literals of the input data type.
        Parameters:
        stateChanges - are the state changes of type OntStateChangeBuf, which include the state values.
        dataType - is the ontology data type to filter the different state values.
        Returns:
        a list of filtered (literals only) state changes.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException - is thrown in case one important value is null.

      • getAggLiteralElements

        static List<OntAggregatedStateChange> getAggLiteralElements(List<OntAggregatedStateChange> stateChanges,
                                                            OntConfig.StateValueType dataType)
                                                     throws org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException
        Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes literals of the input data type.
        Parameters:
        stateChanges - are the state changes of type OntAggregatedStateChange, which include the state values.
        dataType - is the ontology data type to filter the different state values.
        Returns:
        a list of filtered state changes.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException - is thrown in case some state values are null.

      • getResourceElements

        static List<OntStateChangeBuf> getResourceElements(List<OntStateChangeBuf> stateChanges)
        Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes resources.
        Parameters:
        stateChanges - are the state changes of type OntStateChangeBuf, which include the state values.
        Returns:
        a list of filtered state changes.

      • getAggResourceElements

        static List<OntAggregatedStateChange> getAggResourceElements(List<OntAggregatedStateChange> stateChanges)
        Method filters the input state changes and returns state changes, which includes resources.
        Parameters:
        stateChanges - are the state changes of type OntAggregatedStateChange, which include the state values.
        Returns:
        a list of filtered state changes.

      • getRDFNodeName

        static String getRDFNodeName(org.apache.jena.query.QuerySolution querySolution,
                             String name)
                      throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method gets the rdfNode from the input querySolution based on input name and returns the lexical form. The affected rdfNode must be a literal or resource.
        Parameters:
        querySolution - is the single answer of the SELECT query, which contains the needed rdfNode.
        name - of the searched rdfNode. It's the control variable from the sparql query (e.g. ?unit - without "?").
        Returns:
        the lexical form of the searched rdfNode.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case at least one input parameter is null, the input name doesn't represent a rdfNode in the querySolution or the founded rdfNode is neither a literal nor a resource.
